title.text: OTTO: A Transcription and Management Tool for Historical Texts

abstractContent.text: This paper presents OTTO, a transcription tool designed for diplomatic transcription of historical language data.

entities.text: diplomatic transcription of historical language data

abstractContent.text: The tool supports easy and fast typing and instant rendering of transcription in order to gain a look as close to the original manuscript as possible.
In addition, the tool provides support for the management of transcription projects which involve distributed, collaborative working of multiple parties on collections of documents.
